title: Blackstone chief Stephen Schwarzman on retiring: ‘Why would I stop? I’d stop if I weren’t any good’
text:
For a close friend of Donald Trump, private equity billionaire Stephen Schwarzman’s recent choice of reading matter is interesting.

The Blackstone co-founder has just finished Jared Cohen’s Accidental Presidents, a study of the eight vice-presidents who were thrust into the most powerful office in the world after the incumbent’s death. “All of a sudden the country went in a completely different direction,” the 72-year old muses.

He assures me it’s a coincidence – “I just get curious about things” – despite the current impeachment furore over claims the President leaned on the Ukranian president for dirt on his likely Democratic rival for the White House next year, Joe Biden.

Although Richard...
description: For a close friend of Donald Trump, private equity billionaire Stephen Schwarzman’s recent choice of reading matter is interesting.
